biotools.summary: Developed for use in exploring the taxonomic annotations for a marker-gene metagenomic sequence dataset. The package can be used to explore the taxonomic composition of a marker-gene database or annotated sequences from a marker-gene metagenome experiment.

bioschemas.name: metagenomeFeatures
